channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Let’s call tariffs what they are: A tax hike on Americans
item.description: Congress has effectively given the president the power to impose new taxes.

item.title: Cohere’s first vision model Aya Vision is here with broad, multilingual understanding and open weights — but there’s a catch
item.description: Aya Vision 8B and 32B demonstrate best-in-class performance relative to their parameter size, outperforming much larger models.
